resources.string: Request a Generate of Password with button below
Click plus icon to add accounts
Enter first account on the right
No search items. May need to ask to prepare search db from account db in previous panel.
Accounts List, sorted by Open Date
Import Accounts from a prior export
Refresh Search DB from Accounts DB
For efficient reasons, Search DB is a small copy of Accounts DB
Organize Accounts, Search Accounts, Suggested Passwords

This app tracks your accounts, has sorted lists, search of accounts, suggests 8 or 10 character passwords. 

Keeping passwords electronically, even if encrypted, may leave you open to have your credentials stolen. Important: Having an electronic copy (from a file or the app"s database) with the credentials of company, user name, and password would highly exposed your accounts to hackers. 
For this security reason, the passwords are not saved on a file or database. This app keeps account information excluding passwords. Your action is to manually tie together using the account id from this app to the written list of account id and password value. 
Tip: Use the export as the backup of your app data. If the databases is uninstalled, import of the previously exported file. Share exported file to email or Dropbox. 
Passwords are generated with a capital letter, a number, and all letters are either from left or right-hand keyboard keys. 
Use the menu to add an account, see a account list, search accounts, generate passwords. 

Important note: Backup your data, by export to a file. This file goes to your storage. When you view this exported data, it shows where it is located. Also, it gives an option to send to email or dropbox. This accessed on Account List, then select at the bottom for a list, to request View Exported Accounts list Personally, I like to send to my dropbox. Unfortunately, a few times when not under the app, the database was wiped out. Using this import, restores this data. Make sure to keep it up-to-date.
Prior closed into this account Id
This account closed to another account Id
When items are found, either select search icon on keyboard or select one of the items from the dropdown list.
Warning: Reload Search Dictionary DB when account corp names are new, deleted, or changed.\nUse button below to rebuild search dictionary.
